episodes.title: His Shocking Experience: Accidentally Joining a Korean Cult
episodes.description:
In this video, you will hear a shocking story of someone unintentionally becoming involved with a Korean cult. Learn about his experience and gain insights on how to steer clear of such situations. Watch till the end to discover valuable tips on avoiding cults. If you're interested in learning more about cults in Korea and how to protect yourself, this video is a must-watch.

Let's look at how members of religious cults approach people on the streets:

1. Do you have religious knowledge?
2. Asking for directions
3. Questionnaire
4. Psychological test
5. Comments on your aura & facial expression
6. Fake street casting offer
7. Fake interest in the opposite gender
8. Speaking to foreign tourists about Korean culture

Did you know Koreans can be cold to strangers? This is because there are many cults here. The best way to handle this is to ignore them. Please be cautious if two people approach you.

Thank you for sharing your story,  @endlessdejavu_,  I am so glad that you are alive!
https://www.instagram.com/endlessdejavu_/
